bugs: [Bug] - Logging functions now accurately say where the log was called from. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/230)
[Bug] - Multiple site login from the same domain. Cookies are now set to the path of the installation instead of the base domain. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/229)
[Feature] - Introduced the Sandbox. A place for you to test out all of your API needs. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/224)
[Bug] - Something strange with the upload media feature... vagueness... [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/147)
[Enhancement] - The media feature will now show more descriptive errors on why a file failed to upload. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/146)
